title: Superman eBook 13-Pack - Books & Science Articles
description:
A baker's dozen of e-Books and scientific articles that explore the history, legacy, and scientific aspects of the Man of Steel.


Ben Tippett - A Unified Theory of Superman's Powers
James Kakalios - The Physics of Superheroes
John B Pittenger - On the Plausibility of Superman's X-Ray vision
Larry Niven - Man of Steel, Woman of Kleenex
Larry Tye - Superman The High Flying History of Americas Most Enduring Hero
Les Daniels - Superman The Complete History
Lois H Gresh and Robert Weinberg - The Science of Superheroes
Lois H Gresh and Robert Weinberg - The Science of Supervillans
Mark D. White - Superman and Philosophy
Michael L. Fleisher - The Great Superman Book
Scott Beatty - Superman The Ultimate Guide to the Man of Steel
Superheroes (A Never Ending Battle) book - Laurence Maslon and Michael Kantor
The Science of Superman book by Mark Wolverton
